title: Sandy Hawk, a victim seen between the dead of Peshawar?
subtitle: Rumor has it that Sandy Hawk shot the victim, Noah Bozner, was photographed among the victims of the 2014 school massacre in Pakistan.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: Sandy Hawk shot the victim (Noah Posner) and was photographed among those killed during an attack in December 2014 on a school in Pakistan.
